subject: Cheerleaders
Sexual Harassment
Football
Minimum Wage
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: Five former Buffalo Bills cheerleaders sued the team over a pay system they say had them working hundreds of hours unpaid at games and at mandatory public appearances at which they were subjected to groping and sexual comments.
snippet: Five former Buffalo Bills cheerleaders sued the team over a pay system they say had them working hundreds of hours unpaid at games and at mandatory public appearances at which they were subjected to groping and sexual comments.
